summary: An ordinance relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing expenditures in addition to those under Ordinance 86064 for a traffic interchange at 15th Avenue West and West Garfield Street in connection with the program of arterial betterments; making appropriations from the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bonds 1954 Fund and the Seattle General Street Lighting Bonds 1948 Fund therefor, and amending Section 2 of Ordinance 87024.
